author: Morgan McFall-Johnsen
title: Periods of social distancing might be necessary into 2022 to avoid overwhelming hospitals, Harvard researchers say
description: Social distancing measures could be necessary on and off through 2022, according to infectious-disease researchers at Harvard. To prepare for future waves of infections and build "herd immunity," the researchers said countries should expand their critical car…
content: As parts of the US reach the peak of their first wave of coronavirus infections, officials and experts are trying to discern what lies on the other side. According to infectious-disease researchers at Harvard, that could be another two years of on-and-off soc… [+3318 chars]
